nav.div: North Kitsap School District » Coronavirus Resources

strong.span: Support During School Closure March 16 through end of 2019-2020 School Year (June 19)

p.style: box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 20px; caret-color: rgb(73, 80, 87); color: rgb(73, 80, 87); font-family: franklin-gothic-urw, sans-serif; font-size: 17px;

div.p: North Kitsap School District is committed to supporting our children and community through these unprecedented times. On Monday, April 6, Governor Inslee announced that all schools in Washington State will need to close their schools for the reminder of the 2019-2020 school year. Below are links to programs regarding nutrition, childcare, and educational services during this time period.

p.style: box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 20px; caret-color: rgb(73, 80, 87); color: rgb(73, 80, 87); font-family: franklin-gothic-urw, sans-serif; font-size: 17px;

div.p: We will continue to provide regular updates as more details emerge or if guidance from the Governor’s Office, OPSI, or Public Health changes.

p.span: ATTENTION SENIORS! WE HAVE CREATED A WEBSITE JUST FOR YOU.

span.a: Tips for talking to kids about school closures and COVID-19 from OSPI.

span.style: font-family: "Source Sans Pro"; font-size: medium; font-variant-ligatures: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2;

span.style: font-family: "Source Sans Pro"; font-size: medium; font-variant-ligatures: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2;

div.span: has resources for benefits, Employee Assistance Program and more.

ul.style: list-style-type: none; padding: 0px; font-variant-ligatures: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2;

li.span: Kitsap County Resources - this website provides resources to help individuals, small businesses, non-profit organizations, as well as ways to help others. The information on this page is managed by the Kitsap Community Foundation.

ul.style: list-style-type: none; padding: 0px; font-size: 13.3333px; font-variant-ligatures: normal; orphans: 2; widows: 2;
